name: Looper! The Magical Ball
description:
Looper! The Magical Ball is a hilarious and outrageous fun puzzle game!
Every tap starts a colourful new beat that travels along increasingly complex constellations - get your timing wrong and the beats could crash and burn. Addictive and entertaining games let remove your free time and your boredom go right away.
>How to play?
Tap to start a colourful. Brain and your hand need to play game puzzle for all ball do not touch each other when moving.

>Highlights:
Easy to play and pleasurable game for all age.
A music puzzle game like no other.
Puzzle and brain on game
